name: Droid Starfighter Laser Cannons
Lore: 'Standard weapon aboard all droid starfighters. Used to eliminate fast- moving starfighters which battleship laser batteries have difficulty targeting.',
Text: 'Deploy on your droid starfighter. May target a starship using 2 Force. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny > defense value. If destiny +1 = defense value, target is power = 0 until end of turn.',
